issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
1. In the set method should not use long as parameter. It is hardly the case that there are more than 2^32 distinct values in a dictionary. If it really happens, maybe it means we should not have used dictionary in the first place. 

2. In addition to the get method, there should also be a set method.

comments.body: For #1, the baseIntVector isn't just for dictionaries, its a general interface which is why it was changed to long.
[~emkornfield@gmail.com]. I see. That makes sense. Thanks for the clarification.
[~tianchen92] it seems reasonable to add a getLong to me, rephrased the JIRA title
